channel.title: CVE Feed for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6895, MT6897, MT6983, MT8188, MT8195, MT8395
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6895, MT6897, MT6983, MT8188, MT8195, MT8395

item.title: CVE-2023-20840|2024-08-02T09:14:41.001Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6895%2C%20mt6897%2C%20mt6983%2C%20mt8188%2C%20mt8195%2C%20mt8395
item.description: In imgsys, there is a possible out of bounds read and write due to a missing valid range checking. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07326430; Issue ID: ALPS07326430.

item.title: CVE-2023-20845|2024-08-02T09:14:41.202Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6895%2C%20mt6897%2C%20mt6983%2C%20mt8188%2C%20mt8195%2C%20mt8395
item.description: In imgsys, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing valid range checking. This could lead to local information disclosure with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07197795; Issue ID: ALPS07340357.
